page.title: 15 DEFENCE
page.content: When William the Conqueror wrote the original Domesday book he made a rule that each land owner must provide defence for his coastline-"A Man With A Musket". This law applies to Sark's 40 Tenements or land owners. Sark has nine cannons around the coastline, one of which has ben renovated by the school woodwork class. There is also a gun in the Seigneurie that was presented to the Seigneur of Sark by Elizabeth I. It has an inscription on it that reads: "Her Royal Highness Queen Elizabeth I to the Seigneur of Sark.1572". This makes the gun 413 years old.
